DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , cross-over , single-blind study compare effect nebivolol metoprolol central aortic pressure peripheral brachial pressure patient stable cardiovascular disease .
DOC.criteria: Subjects history hypertension Subjects receive metoprolol minimum 3 month Patients acute myocardial infarction , coronary revascularization hospitalize heart failure cardiac arrhythmia past 6 month
